ui.heroSubtitle: Learn to create stunning particle effects from beginner to expert
ui.mobileMessage: This application is optimized for desktop devices. Please open it on a desktop or laptop computer for the best experience.
ui.homeDescription: Welcome to the comprehensive learning platform for Babylon.js Node Particle Editor. Master the art of creating stunning particle effects through interactive lessons, hands-on examples, and step-by-step tutorials.
ui.homeFeaturesDesc: Learn by doing with live editor previews and hands-on examples
ui.homeStructuredDesc: Progressive lessons from basics to advanced techniques
ui.homeSelfPacedDesc: Learn at your own speed with detailed explanations and solutions

topic1.title: Basics
topic1.description: Fundamental concepts of particle creation and basic properties

topic2.title: Emitters & Shapes
topic2.description: Different ways to create and position particles

topic3.title: Physics & Movement
topic3.description: Applying physics and forces to particles

topic4.title: Color & Visual Effects
topic4.description: Managing particle appearance and visual effects
